trans-unit.source: The configuration procedure of the image server is similar to the configuration of the Solr server.

seg-source.mrk: The configuration procedure of the image server is similar to the configuration of the Solr server.

target.mrk: Analog zur Konfiguration des Apache Solr-Server lässt sich der Imageserver konfigurieren.

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions in <MadCap:xref href="configure-apache-solr.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the Apache Solr server (optional) </MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Follow the instructions in <MadCap:xref href="configure-apache-solr.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the Apache Solr server (optional) </MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Folgenden Sie hierfür den Anweisungen unter <MadCap:xref href="configure-apache-solr.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Configuring the Apache Solr server (optional) </MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: This time, move the folder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">imageservice</kbd> from the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory of the Signavio Tomcat to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory of the image service Tomcat and add the following line to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd> file:

seg-source.mrk: This time, move the folder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">imageservice</kbd> from the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory of the Signavio Tomcat to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory of the image service Tomcat and add the following line to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd> file:

target.mrk: Verschieben Sie dieses Mal den Ordner <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">imageservice</kbd> aus dem <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd>-Verzeichnis des Signavio-Tomcats in das <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd>-Verzeichnis des Imageserver-Tomcats und fügen Sie die folgende Zeile zur <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd> hinzu:

trans-unit.source: Replace the URL <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://localhost:8080</kbd> with the URL of your image server.

seg-source.mrk: Replace the URL <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://localhost:8080</kbd> with the URL of your image server.

target.mrk: Ersetzen Sie die URL <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://localhost:8080</kbd> mit der URL Ihres Imageservers.
